titleStmt.title: The Remonstrance and petition of the county of Huntington, the knights, gentlemen, clergy, freeholders, and inhabitiants. To the right honourable the Lords, and Commons assembled in Parliament, for the continuance of the church-government, and divine service, or Book of common prayer.

notesStmt.note: Date and place of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
